content:
I apologize for any confusion or frustration caused. As an AI language model, I can provide general guidance and support, but I don't have the ability to access real-time information on recent disasters. 

To file a claim for damages caused by the hurricane in your area, you should contact your insurance company as soon as possible. They will provide you with specific instructions on how to file a claim and what documentation you need to provide. The requirements for filing a claim may vary depending on the insurance company and the extent of the damage. You can generally find contact information for your insurance company on your policy documents or their website.

You can also seek assistance from local government agencies or disaster relief organizations, who may offer resources and information on how to file a claim for damages caused by the hurricane.
